title: Sunrise Inc.
Formerly: Nippon Sunrise Inc. , 株式会社日本サンライズ
Founded: September 1972; 47 years ago (1972-09) (as Sunrise Studio YK) , November 1976; 43 years ago (1976-11) (as Nippon Sunrise; renamed Sunrise in June 1987; 32 years ago (1987-06))
Subsidiaries: Sunrise Music Publishing , Bandai Namco Pictures , Sunrise Beyond
